recipe.title: Quick Chicken Pho
recipe.step: Combine ginger, garlic, star anise, soy and fish sauce with 2 cups of water. Bring to boil rapidly then reduce to simmer. Mean while prepare herbs and vegetables then set aside. Add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes then remove to a plate. Remove ginger and star anise from broth. Discard both, then add chicken stock to broth and bring to the boil. Mean while cook noodles per instructions and shred chicken fillets. Once noodles are done seperate between 4-5 bowls, ladle over broth then sprinkle over chicken. Add all other ingredients in a decorative way and serve immediately. Recipe can be doubled.
